name: Tools of Destruction
entries: At 2nd level, Demolitionists gain access to powerful new tools; The {@item Explosive Lobber|TftJC} and {@item Flamethrower|TftJC}. Only Demolitionists can use them.

They use unique ammo instead of bullets, and have their own resource for such. A number of times per short rest equal to your Proficiency Bonus, you can empower your Tools of Destruction. As a Bonus Action or as a part of Shoot to Thrill, you can double the explosive or cone value for your Tools of Destruction until the end of your turn.
